articles.title: US airline reclaims title as world's largest carrier - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Based on flights scheduled, seat counts and how many passenger miles it has planned, American has been the biggest carrier in the world since April.
articles.content: American Airlines has taken the pandemic as an opportunity to re-emerge as the world's largest airline, a title it has traded back and forth with competitors during the last few years as Delta and Un… [+4249 chars]

articles.title: American mother turns around heroin addict life - Newshub
articles.description: Prison allowed her to get clean and transform herself.
articles.content:
A former heroin addict has posted a shocking before-and-after picture of herself in the hope of deterring others from a life of drug addiction.

articles.title: 'They know what a threat he is' - Southgate defends Kane after quiet game in England victory - Goal.com
articles.description: Lionel Messi says he doesn't believe that Argentina have ever been overly dependent on his contributions as he said the team is currently "on the right track" ahead of the Copa America.
